draw up.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to prepare a written document, such as a list or contract
draw up.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Draw up a list of all the things you want to do.
The contract was drawn up last year.
He was asked to draw up proposals for reforming the law.
draw up.translation[0].definitions[1].de: if a vehicle draws up, it arrives somewhere and stops
draw up.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: A taxi drew up at the gate.
draw up.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to move a chair closer to someone or something
draw up.translation[0].definitions[3].de: to stand up very straight because you are angry or determined about something
draw up.translation[0].definitions[3].ex: He drew himself up and said, ‘This has gone far enough.’
draw up.translation[0].definitions[4].de: to bring your legs closer to your body
draw up.translation[0].definitions[4].ex: Ruth sat, knees drawn up under her chin, and waited.
draw up.translation[0].note_box[0].secti: draw up a plan/scheme
Local authorities have drawn up new plans for waste disposal.
draw up a proposal
The European Communities were drawing up proposals to control the export of chemicals.
draw up a list
They drew up a list of suitable candidates for the job.
draw up guidelines
A committee of teachers has drawn up guidelines for schools on how to deal with difficult students.
draw up a report
Environmental organizations have been involved in drawing up the report.
draw up a contract/agreement
Some people draw up a contract when they get married.
draw up a timetable/schedule
They haven’t yet drawn up a timetable for the elections.
draw up a programme
A small team has drawn up a programme of action.
draw up a constitution
The first Czech constitution was drawn up here in 1920.
draw up a budget
Each year business managers draw up a budget.
draw up.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to write out or prepare an agreement, list, plan etc
draw up.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The chairman had drawn up an agenda.
The first thing you need to do is draw up a business plan.
Our selection committee drew up the list of candidates.
